title: Milestone database and analysis code for 'Civilizational Dynamics and the Evolution of Life Based on an Exponential Decay Model' (double-blind package)
description: Milestone node dates (Life + Civilization), derived inter-event intervals, log-transformed series, and minimal analysis code to reproduce the core log-linear exponential decay fit reported in the associated manuscript. Prepared for double-blind review; replace placeholders (DOI, version, creators) as appropriate.
notes: After reserving a DOI on Zenodo, replace the DOI placeholder in the manuscript Data Availability statement and in this metadata.
